# Basic statistics formulas

## Mean formula:

$$
\bar{x} = \frac{1}{n}\sum_{i = 1}^{n}{x_i}
$$

## Median formula

$$
MDN = \begin{cases} 
    X[\frac{n+1}{2}] \space \text{n is odd} \\ 
\\
    \frac{X[\frac{n}{2}] + X[\frac{n}{2} + 1]}{2}  \space \text{n is even} 
  \end{cases}
$$

## Variance formula

$$
Var = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n}{\left(x_i-\bar{x}\right)^2}}{n-1}
$$

$$
Var = p \cdot (1-p)
$$

## Standard deviation

$$
SD=\sqrt{Var \space}
$$
